Package controller

Class AdminHomeScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.AdminHomeScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AdminHomeScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the controller class for the AdminHomeScreen.fxml document and is not meant to be instantiated. The class will load from the LoginScreen if the user enters login credentials that identify them as an admin user.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method is called by the FXMLLoader.load() call contained in the loginValidation() method of the LoginScreenController class. The method populates the table with all the Salesperson data that is in the database.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      resourceBundle - An unreferenced ResourceBundle object passed automatically
      url - An unreferenced URL object passed automatically

    • searchSalespersons

      public void searchSalespersons(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is an event handler on the searchTextField. Search function searches the allSalespersonsList for matches containing either the string or ID entered.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the text field.

    • toSignOut

      public void toSignOut(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is an event handler on the "Sign Out" button. When clicked, the button redirects the program to the original Login Screen
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the "Sign Out" button.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception gets thrown if load() cannot locate the FXML file

    • toSalespersonDetailScreen

      public void toSalespersonDetailScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is an event handler on the Salesperson Detail button. When clicked, the button redirects the program to the SalespersonDetailScreen for the selected salesperson.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the Salesperson Detail button.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception gets thrown if load() cannot locate the FXML file

    • toCreateNewUserScreen

      public void toCreateNewUserScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is an event handler on the Create New User button. When clicked, the button redirects the program to the CreateNewSalespersonScreen
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the Create New Salesperson button.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception gets thrown if load() cannot locate the FXML file

    • toAllClientsScreen

      public void toAllClientsScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is an event handler on the "All Clients" button. When clicked, the button redirects the program to the AllCustomersScreen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the "All Clients" button.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception gets thrown if load() cannot locate the FXML file
